text: William Richards Bennett, PC, OBC (August 18, 1932 - December 3, 2015), commonly known as Bill Bennett, was a Canadian politician. He was the 27th Premier of the Canadian province of British Columbia 1975-1986\. He was a son of the former Premier, W. A. C. Bennett. He was a 3rd cousin, twice removed, of R.B. Bennett, eleventh Prime Minister of Canada. Bennett died on December 3, 2015 at the age of 83 from Alzheimer's disease in Kelowna, British Columbia. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:Disease-related deaths in British Columbia Category:People from Kelowna Category:Premiers of British Columbia Category:Privy Councillors (Canada)
title: Bill Bennett
